1st July to 30th September 2025

Avail Now
Eligible Cards

All SBI Credit Cards excluding Corporate Cards , Paytm SBI Credit Card & Cashback SBI Credit Card.

Summary
Up to Rs 5,000 Instant Discount on select Nothing Smartphones using SBI Credit card
Offer is applicable only on EMI transactions
Offer valid on select offline stores with Pine Labs
Offer also valid on e-stores powered by Pine PG
Offer valid only on one txn per card per aggregator per channel per month during offer period
Offer is not valid on Corporate cards, Paytm co-brand, Cashback card & & UPI transactions on Rupay credit card
This is an instant discount program. No cashback will be posted later

Shop for products with SBI Credit Card. For store listclick here.
